sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-fab-transition>
    <!-- <v-btn
      v-show="fab"
      v-scroll="onScroll"
      fab
      dark
      fixed
      bottom
      right
      color="error"
      @click="toTop"
    >
      <v-icon>mdi-chevron-up</v-icon>
    </v-btn> -->
  </v-fab-transition>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'TheLayoutToTopFab',
  data: () => ({
    fab: false,
  }),
  methods: {
    onScroll() {
      if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;
      const top = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.offsetTop || 0;
      this.fab = top > 300;
    },
    toTop() {
      this.$router.push({ hash: '' });
      this.$vuetify.goTo(0);
    },
  },
};
</script>
